data.title: Gravity, Fate, & Kismet
data.meta_description: Shop our selection of Newton Running shoes! Newton Running shoes have a patented technology that ensures you the best form of comfort and durability.
data.text:
Newton Running

Newton Running exist to make every stride better. Their mission is to be the world’s leader in natural running shoe technology and form, and use their platform to advance social responsibility initiatives to help make the world a better place.

Newton’s patented active technology delivers unprecedented cushioning and responsiveness to help you run better, faster and healthier. The secret sauce powering the speed of Newton Running shoes is its proprietary Action/Reaction™ Technology. Generated by the active movement of the lugs, Action/Reaction Technology creates a responsive, trampoline-like cushioning system that provides quicker bounce-back and loses less energy than a traditional foam-core running shoe.
